Package api

Interface IPlayerApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerBean
public interface IPlayerApi
Interface for access to database via EJB. It is intended for clients. This interface provides Players data.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayers

      List<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns:
      List of all players saved in the database

    • getTopScorers

      List<Player> getTopScorers()
      Returns:
      List of best scorers over all teams. Players with 0 goals are not included

    • getPlayersWithTheMostMinutesPlayed

      List<Player> getPlayersWithTheMostMinutesPlayed()
      Returns:
      List of players who played the most minutes for a season

    • getTheOldestPlayers

      List<Player> getTheOldestPlayers()
      Returns:
      List of the oldest players in the league

    • getPlayersWithTheMostAssists

      List<Player> getPlayersWithTheMostAssists()
      Returns:
      List of players who has the most assist. Players with 0 assist are not included.

    • getGoalkeepersWithTheMostCleanSheets

      List<Player> getGoalkeepersWithTheMostCleanSheets()
      Returns:
      Only goalkeepers who has the most clean sheets for a season
